title: HELP! Can't left click on minimap or left click to place wards!
body: As you can see from the title, I can't left click the minimap or place wards, but I can use shift+left click to do it. It is really, really frustrating. I've tried deleting stuff from the config folder, that didn't work. I tried restoring my default settings, that didn't work. Please help.

replies.body: i thought this was an update. my client updated and then this happened. Also, i can't see the circle thing around my champ when i want to check the range of my abilities. it's like some sort of key is stuck on my keyboard.

I've seen some reports of this after a recent issue that cause some settings and bindings to reset for some players.  Resetting your config should fix this up, though I see you tried that already.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can check this out and help.  We'll reply asap!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FGFubQr9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-05T21:04:24.145+0000)
>
> I've seen some reports of this after a recent issue that cause some settings and bindings to reset for some players.  Resetting your config should fix this up, though I see you tried that already.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can check this out and help.  We'll reply asap!

Thanks!
Also how long will it take to process the help ticket?
